## TransactableProtocol.claimCollateralSurplus() method

Claim leftover collateral after a liquidation or redemption.

**Signature:**

```typescript
claimCollateralSurplus(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

Use [getCollateralSurplusBalance()](./lib-base.readableprotocol.getcollateralsurplusbalance.md) to check the amount of collateral available for withdrawal.
